#summary Bamboo配置简介

= 符号说明 =

只有以#开头的行为注释行。可以使用$符号进行变量引用(可以使用\逃逸)。每一行配置为一个Key-Value对，用等号分割。


= 配置文件示例 =

请参考[ConfigurationSample]


= 配置项详细说明 =

== processor_root ==

处理器模块存放目录。

== process_chain ==

处理链定义。

常用配置有:
  * UNIGRAM分词: process_chain = ascii, unigram, single_combine
  * CRF分词: process_chain = ascii, crf, single_combine
  * CRF2分词: process_chain = prepare, crf2, single_combine

== crf_model ==
*crf模块参数*
crf的模型文件

== crf2_model ==
*crf2模块参数*
crf2的模型文件

== lexicon_unigram == 
*unigram模块参数*
Unigram 辞典路径


== lexicon_combine == 
*single_combine模块参数*
user_combine 辞典路径

== number_trailing ==

*single_combine模块参数*
number_trailing 辞典路径

== max_token_length ==

扫描最长词的长度

== ele_estimate ==

*Unigram 模块参数*
Unigram分词的ELE平滑系数

== combine_double_same_character ==

*single_combine模块参数*
当该值为1时，组合双字的词，例如“说说”，“看看”，“试试”，等等

== prepare_characterize ==

*prepare模块参数*
当该值为1时，对中文进行单字切分。(给CRF2提供输入用)。

= 例子 =

{{{
root = /opt/bamboo
processor_root = $root/processor

# For Unigram Model
#process_chain = ascii, unigram, single_combine

# For CRF Model
#process_chain = ascii, crf, single_combine

# For CRF2 Model
process_chain = prepare, crf2, single_combine

crf_model = $root/index/crf.model
crf2_model =$root/index/crf2.model

lexicon_unigram = $root/index/unigram.idx
lexicon_combine = $root/index/user_combine.idx
lexicon_number_trailing = $root/index/number-trailing.idx

ele_lambda = 0.5

max_token_length = 8

}}}
